c74object.name: tap.decibels~
c74object.description:
The signal processing does not need to be on for the floating point conversion to operate (just like MSP's standard mstosamps~ object).
The object is also optimized so that if no signals are connected, the object is not added to the DSP chain, hence it does not use any CPU if it is not connected.

method.name: float
method.description: Converted to a different unit based on the mode attribute.

attribute.name: mode
attribute.description: The mode attribute determines the type of operation performed by tap.decibels~. The default is 'amp2db'.
